Title: Relates to providing for multi-formatted services menus for the cognitively impaired on websites operated by certain state agencies
Summary: Relates to providing for multi-formatted services menus for the cognitively impaired on websites operated by certain state agencies; includes the department of health, office for people with developmental disabilities and the office of mental health.
LawCode: Add ยง170-i, Exec L; amd ยง103, St Tech L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the state technology law, in relation to providing for multi-formatted services menus for the cognitively impaired on websites operated by certain state agencies
